title: Delicate Diamond-Studded Mangalsutra - Nalla Pusala Danda
materials: black onyx beads. Hyderabadi polish for lasting shine.
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Mangalsutra. Features a delicate rose gold plated chain interspersed with traditional black onyx beads (nalla pusalu). The pendant showcases an oval CZ-studded centerpiece with a floral design. Exquisite detailing with precise stone setting, creating a radiant sparkle.
occasions: and as a thoughtful gift for your loved one. Suitable for traditional occasions and modern celebrations alike.
description: This mangalsutra seamlessly blends tradition with modern aesthetics. The rose gold finish and delicate design make it a versatile piece that complements any outfit. High-quality CZ stones offer the brilliance of diamonds at an accessible price point. Symbolically significant and beautifully crafted, a testament to enduring love and commitment.
